vclaim: The United States withdrawal from Afghanistan put more than $80 billion worth of equipment — including 22,174 Humvees and 33 Black Hawk helicopters — in the hands of the Taliban.
title: Did US Leave More Than $80B Worth of Equipment to the Taliban?
subtitle: The "Taliban's New Arsenal" does not include 22,000 Humvees or 33 Black Hawk helicopters.
author: Dan Evon
